robot_xml_log.title: Robot XML Log
robot_xml_log.description: Log format in output*.xml files created by Robot

sample.line: <msg timestamp="20201102 15:01:34.952" level="DEBUG">[chan 5] Max packet in: 32768 bytes</msg>
<msg timestamp="20201102 15:01:35.433" level="INFO">[chan 2] Opened sftp connection (server version 3)
